location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the endorsement by Riach of a set of bills of exchange drawn by Henry Willock, His Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires, relating to subsidiary payments on account of His Majesty's mission to Persia. Riach forwards a register of the bills (not transcribed) to Wedderburn
